m_szDocTitle: Tesla Quietly Releases Redesigned Model S Handle Mechanism | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Sure, volatility in TSLA is always going to be greater than for a  typical dividend stock. And many people have seen a general market correction coming for some time. Some of us even kept some money aside to buy into the correction. And I’m probably going to take another bet on Tesla early next week, before the Wednesday quarterly. BUT… There is no guarantee that Tesla will simply bounce back and then grow indefinitely in a similarly bouncy fashion. The valuation is predicated on the ability to deliver 500k cars in 2020, at a 20-25% gross margin. Some of the biggest bulls are starting to raise
